name: ssh_script
description: Cross-platform shell script to automate SSH key generation and configuration for GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket
features: Automated SSH key generation (Ed25519 for GitHub/Bitbucket, RSA-4096 for GitLab)
Automatic browser opening to SSH settings
SSH agent management and key testing
Input validation for email and key names
architecture: CLI automation script with platform detection and cross-platform command handling
